name: SPACESHOOT (tnt4snivy)
description:
A simple high-score based top-down arcade shooter.

Controls:

The player ship will face wherever the mouse is on the screen. 

To move forward: Left click or Press the 'W' key.

To shoot: Right click or press the spacebar

(a mouse is recommended for playing)

Made using the Godot engine as a way to practice and improve my skills, feedback and criticism is welcome and appreciated. Have fun!
